name: Sampo
story: A merchant who freely travels between the Overworld and the Underworld.He acts like he is everyone's friend, is enthusiastically humorous, and is good at bantering.

skills.name: Dazzling Blades
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Ricochet Love
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to single enemy targets with 5 Bounces in total.

skills.name: Surprise Present
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all enemies, with a high chance to cause increased DoT taken to them.

skills.name: Windtorn Dagger
skills.description: After hitting an enemy, there is a chance of inflicting Wind Shear on the target.

skills.name: Shining Bright
skills.description: Enemies in a set area are Blinded. When initiating battle against a Blinded enemy, there is a high chance to delay all enemies' actions.

eidolons.name: Rising Love
eidolons.description: When using Skill, deals DMG for 1 extra time(s) to a random enemy.

eidolons.name: Infectious Enthusiasm
eidolons.description: Defeating an enemy with Wind Shear has a 100% base chance to inflict all enemies with 1 stack(s) of Wind Shear, equivalent to the Talent's Wind Shear.

eidolons.name: Big Money!
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: The Deeper the Love, the Stronger the Hate
eidolons.description: When Skill hits an enemy with 5 or more stack(s) of Wind Shear, the enemy immediately takes 8% of current Wind Shear DMG.

eidolons.name: Huuuuge Money!
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Increased Spending
eidolons.description: Talent's Wind Shear DMG multiplier increases by 15%.
